response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet high standards and expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to quality and functionality designed to enhance your daily experiences. Given its exceptional features and craftsmanship, we believe its true value exceeds $80. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I kindly propose a special introductory offer of $95 for you to experience all it has to provide. I trust this price reflects both the value of the product and the opportunity for you to enjoy its benefits. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring this offer further.", "product_price": 95}
